p: Confirmed and probable COVID-19 cases were defined according to the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) Case Definition for COVID-19 [ 25]. The degree of severity of COVID-19 was defined according to the American Thoracic Society guidelines for community-acquired pneumonia [ 26]. Last CD4 + T-cell count and plasma HIV RNA (viral load) were the most recent values registered at the clinical database, usually within the last 6 months period.
